descriptionHtml:
[b]Players home.

[/b]Entrance to [b]APIX[/b] see picture for info.

I have tested the navmesh with a follower and encountered no problems.

[b]Requirements:[/b] Dawnguard.Hearthfire.Dragonborn.

[b]Installation:[/b] Just download with Nexus mod manger, Mod organizer or manual,if you want to install it manually,
                    then you have to extract it into your data file for Skyrim.

[b]Unistallation:[/b]  Just untick in mod manger or mod organzier or delete the files you manually installed.


[b]CREDITS:[/b] Many thanks to     "Malo Statues by Malo"
                                         
                                          "Elianora for Eli Resources"                                                                                            


I hope you enjoy the home.

My Regards to you all.

Thank You.


If you encounter any problems please delete the mod.
author: tanyferan
